1470400.name: Cubiscape 2 - First Expansion Pack
1470400.description:
Overview


A new adventure awaits! This expansion pack improves on everything that makes the base game fun and brings in many new ideas and features to keep you entertained for hours. Support further development of the game!

Features


  • New campaign with 6 chapters and nearly 100 levels in total
  • 4 new puzzle elements with unexpected twists
  • Carefully handcrafted levels in every chapter with slowly increasing difficulty
  • Hints for all levels in case you find yourself stuck
  • All elements available in the Editor
  • New achievements to earn
  • Two new exclusive skins
1470400.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 捷克语*, 俄语*, 意大利语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 土耳其语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
